changeSet.author: fedormichal
changeSet.sql: create table cars ( id bigint not null AUTO_INCREMENT, vin varchar(255), production_year integer, brand varchar(255), model varchar(255), mileage integer, registration varchar(255), is_available boolean, deleted boolean default false, primary key (id) );

changeSet.author: fedormichal
changeSet.sql: create table rents ( id bigint not null AUTO_INCREMENT, date_from date, date_to date, status varchar(255), car_id bigint, user_id bigint, start_mileage integer, end_mileage integer, deleted boolean default false, primary key (id) );

changeSet.author: fedormichal
changeSet.sql: create table users ( id bigint not null AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(255), surname varchar(255), person_id varchar(255), phone_number bigint, email varchar(255), deleted boolean default false, primary key (id) );

changeSet.author: fedormichal
changeSet.sql: create table import_status ( id bigint not null AUTO_INCREMENT, entity varchar(255), submit_time timestamp not null, start_time timestamp, file_name varchar(255) not null, status varchar(10) not null, processed int not null, failed_reason varchar(255), primary key (id) );
